Title: Vampire Diaries Nightfall
Author: এল. জে. স্মীথ
Summary:
To save the two vampire brothers who love her, Elena Gilbert sacrificed her life.

Now that a supernatural force has brought Elena back from the dead, all handsome, brooding Stefan wants is to keep her safe. But when he is lured away from Fell's Church, sleek, powerful Damon seizes his chance to win Elena over, unaware of the danger they're both in. A malevolent being has infiltrated the town and is growing stronger. Able to possess Damon at will, the creature is also drawn to Elena and the new power she has acquired. But it's after more than Elena's power: It thirsts for her death.

Elena's story continues in shadow souls!

Title: Vampire diaries Stefan's Diaries
Author: এল. জে. স্মীথ
Summary:
Set during the Civil War, against a backdrop of grand estates, unimaginable riches, and deadly secrets, three teenagers in Mystic Falls, Virginia enter a torrid love triangle that will span eternity.

Brothers Stefan and Damon Salvatore are inseparable until they meet Katherine, a stunning, mysterious woman who turns their world upside down. Siblings turned rivals, the Salvatores compete for Katherine's affection, only to discover that her sumptuous silk dresses and glittering gems hide a terrible secret: Katherine is a vampire. And she is intent on turning them into vampires so they can live together--forever.

Table of Contents

Fans of the famous TV show and book series, The Vampire Diaries, will be delighted to get a hold of this book. The book is a revelation by one of the protagonists, Stefan, on what really happened between Damon, Katherine and himself.

Summary of the Book

Stefan is not too happy about the fact that he is engaged to be married with a woman he does not love. In the meanwhile, his eye happens to catch the beautiful and seductive Katherine, and he almost immediately falls in love. It is the time of the civil war and the year is 1864. Instead of helping in the battle, Stefan has now a battle of his own to fight. As charming and gorgeous as the mischievous Katherine is, there is a deep dark secret of hers that comes into light as Stefan pursues her. Read on to find out how the Vampire Diaries love triangle actually began, and how love for the same woman has turned two loving brothers into enemies.

About L. J. Smith

L. J. Smith, Lisa Jane Smith, is a New York Times best-selling author. She got this title for her books The Vampire Diaries, The Secret Circle, Dark Visions, Wild World and Night World series. In all, she has written over two dozen books for children and young adults. She calls her readers her favourite people and she cherishes each one of them with deep and lasting affection.
